nodes.text: Varl was a male Human who worked for General Elaxis Frellka of the Galactic Republic and the Republic Strategic Information Service.

During the Galactic War, Varl and his men encountered the the apprentice of Darth Baras who was looking for General Frellka. Varl begged the Warrior to spare him and his men while General Frellka received his alarm. The Wrath killed Varl by crushing him.
